Scripts.OnDragStart: if (self.isPassive) then return end; SpellButton_OnDrag(self, button);

Scripts.OnClick: local parent = self:GetParent(); StaticPopup_Show("UNLEARN_SKILL", parent.skillName, nil, parent.skillLine);
if ( IsModifiedClick() ) then ChatEdit_InsertLink(GetSpellLink(self.spellID)); else ClearCursor() end
